title: ‘It’s Possible He Will Try the Giro-Tour Double in the Future’: Will Jonas Vingegaard Take on Same Lofty Goal as Tadej Pogačar?
content:
In race against time to be at 100 percent for the Tour, Vingegaard's coach Tim Heemskerk says he has a ‘different physiology’ to Pogačar.

Read the full article at ‘It’s Possible He Will Try the Giro-Tour Double in the Future’: Will Jonas Vingegaard Take on Same Lofty Goal as Tadej Pogačar? on Velo.
author: sstokes
